page.title: 14The Media in Stowmarket.
page.content:
In addition to national radio, T.V. and newspapers, there are local sources of information and entertainment. Radio Orwell and Saxon Radio carry news of local interest as well as popular music. The BBC's "Look East" programme and various items transmitted by Anglia TV relate to East Anglia generally. There are six local newspapers:- 1.The 'East Anglian Daily Times';20p. 2.The 'Bury Free Press';25p. 3.The 'Daily Star';18p. 4.The 'Evening Star';17p. 5.The 'Advertiser';(free). 6.The 'Mercury';(free).
The first four of these carry major items of national importance.
